Name: SpinCloudItem
Notes: A collectable item that turns the player into a Cloud character. This power-up state allows them to create up to three temporary cloud platforms.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

Camera.Description: Uses 出現デモカメラ for appearing.

MarioFaceShipNpcRegister.Description: Can be registered to a Starship Mario NPC appearance event.
